thread.title: Ranveer Singh Debuts Jeans By Condom Brand, Durex, And The Internet Is Having A Lark
thread.title_full: Ranveer Singh Debuts Jeans By Condom Brand, Durex, And The Internet Is Having A Lark

title: Ranveer Singh Debuts Jeans By Condom Brand, Durex, And The Internet Is Having A Lark
text:
facebook 
Ranveer Singh and Durex are a match made in heaven (like an orgasmic heaven, or Oh my god! This is heaven!). The actor does full justice to the condom brand with his perpetual I-am-about-to-climax energy that, despite his stardom, has remained redbull-charged through the years. Now, for reasons that are beyond human cognition, Durex has decided to jump straight into the apparel segment with a collection of jeans… yep, this is not an early April Fools’ Day prank. As you read this, Twiterrati are having a field day since the actor took to the platform to drop this epic newsbomb in a 16-second video. The teaser has the actor emerging out of shower curtains(of course) to announce his debut in the one-off denim range. Durex is launching Jeans! Designed for the passionate! Fits well ;) #DurexJeans pic.twitter.com/mGuPLN12xO — Ranveer Singh (@RanveerOfficial) March 22, 2017 
This was enough cue for the humans of Twitter to bring out their award-winning, salacious wit. We don’t blame them… Durex really did walk into this one! Here are some gems that were stretched out of this Durex announcement. Never thought Durex would come up with a pair of Jeans. Stumped! @RanveerOfficial . https://t.co/SCWlCHykQG — mandira bedi (@mandybedi) March 22, 2017 OMG Durex is launching Jeans! @RanveerOfficial are you gonna have sex with Durex on or off? #DurexJeans https://t.co/3qYjNNRbpr — Tanmay Bhat (@thetanmay) March 22, 2017 Wow! Durex is launching jeans!!! Looks like a brand new fashion trend is round the corner @RanveerOfficial https://t.co/PnvMgweOSX — Neha Dhupia (@NehaDhupia) March 22, 2017 LOL Durex is launching Jeans ? Buying them will be like... #DurexJeans pic.twitter.com/ZyYfZvybML
